seo.title: YakShaver developer certifications
seo.description: Earn a YakShaver Developer Credly Badge for LinkedIn. The badge shows that you're a YakShaver certified developer!

featureItem.headline: Become a Chief Yak Officer
featureItem.text: We recommend that each organization have at least one certified Chief Yak Officer (CYO). Each time someone in your organization is certified, the organization will receive 50 credits (valued at $25 USD).

pageBlocks.body:
### You will need to set up YakShaver, understand the best practices, and do a test Shave in which you answer some questions to verify your understanding.

1\. Follow the [docs](https://yakshaver.ai/docs/support) to join YakShaver's Discord channel.

2\. In your [YakShaver portal](https://portal.yakshaver.ai/), add a project called 'Northwind' and set the backlog to this GitHub repo: [https://github.com/SSWConsulting/SSW.YakShaver.Playground](https://github.com/SSWConsulting/SSW.YakShaver.Playground)

3\. Check out the Shaving [best practices](https://yakshaver.ai/docs/user-mention-guidelines-in-work-item-descriptions).

4. Set up a [Windows or Mac screenshot tool](https://yakshaver.ai/docs/recording-work-item-snipping-tool) by following the docs.\
Note: This gives you access to keyboard shortcuts

5. Do a normal YakShave - go to [northwind365.com](https://northwind365.com/) and report that the size of the headings is too small.

6. Do an unorthodox YakShave into the 'Northwind' project. In your recording:

* Show the project's location in the portal, and its backlog
* Demonstrate how you have set up your screen capture tool, and where the videos will go after being recorded
* Explain why you must verbally mention the destination project and why you can't just rely on the screen
* Scenario: A user complains to you that after recording in Teams, they have received no notification from the Yakshaver bot. What is your course of action?
* Scenario: A user reports that their Shave went into the wrong backlog. How do you educate them to avoid the same mistake in the future?
* Feedback: What is your opinion on YakShaver and what feedback would you like to give the team?

7. We will review your video, and if successful you will receive a badge from [Credly](https://info.credly.com/).

8. If you haven't heard from us in 3 days, send an email to [support@yakshaver.ai.](mailto:support@yakshaver.com.au?cc=sswmarketing@ssw.com.au\&subject=Chief%20Yak%20Officer%20-%20I%20haven't%20received%20my%20certification.\&body=Hello%20YakShaver%20team%2C%0AIt%20has%20been%20%7B%7B%20NUMBER%20%7D%7D%20days%20since%20I%20completed%20the%20certification%20steps.%0A%0A1.%20Please%20investigate%20why%20I%20haven't%20received%20my%20certification%20yet.)
## That's it! Your organization will receive 50 YakShaver credits.
